songs.title: Soak City
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(You know we're going to Soak City, USA)
(It's here and it's makin' a splash)
Y'all already know who I am, right?
Here we go, let's go, uh

[Chorus: 310babii]
If you a bad bitch, fuck it up (Fuck it up)
Freak bitch, she touch her toes like what? (Like huh?)
She said it's summertime, she tryna have some fun (Get lit)
If you a freak, do your shit, don't run (Don't do no runnin')

[Verse 1: 310babii]
It's summertime, shit, which hoes fuckin'?
Finna take this lil' bitch, yeah, her nigga ain't on nothin'
Fuck pound town, tryna go to soak city
Your bitch turnt up, she said, "Can you put it in me?" (Slow down)
Like, what? Okay, let's get it (Speed up)
Shit, I done fucked up the whole program (Oh)
I beat her off the wall, dick her down, get nasty on cam
She know I fuck her right, all night? Alright
Turn off the lights, I'm beatin' like I'm Mike
Tell her don't run from this pipe (Aw)
Let me see you fuck it up, go 'head, shake somethin' (Yeah)
The bitch goin' dumb, she done put my chains on
Got her goin' crazy, legs shakin', watch her move
Told her you gotta fuck it up, I'm not the one who make the rules (Aw)

[Refrain: 310babii]
Left, right, let me see you do it (Aw)
Left, do it, right, do it (Aw)
Left, do it, right, do it (Aw)
Left, do it, right, do it (Aw)
Fuck it up, go stupid, fuck it up (Oh yeah)
Fuck it up, fuck it up, fuck it up, go 'head
Fuck it up (Left, right)
Left, right, left, right, left, right, fuck it up (Blueface, let's go)

[Verse 2: Blueface]
Blueface, baby, fuck it up (Fuck it up)
Two bitches, one me, but it's enough (It's enough)
Bought a bitch butt for my bitch butt (Ain't have enough)
Left, right, left, right, bitch, fuck it up (Fuck it up)
I put more hot dogs in these bitch buns
Than a hot dog ever been in a bitch bun (What he say?)
Fum-fum-fum, let me see you do the woody-woo
I'm in the club with this ice, bitch, hoody-hoo
Blueface, School Yard Crip, nigga, who is you?
You, you, you, you, you, you and you, you
Follow me, you gon' make it to the dressing room
Take that shit off, baby, do what you do
Do it, do it, do it, I'm a Crip, she blew it (Do it)
Everything on me brand new, you knew it (Knew it)
I put more nuts in guts than up in the gut (Ooh)
If I put it down on her, she givin' it up (Here we go, uh)

[Chorus: 310babii]
If you a bad bitch, fuck it up (Fuck it up)
Freak bitch, she touch her toes like what? (Like huh?)
She said it's summertime, she tryna have some fun (Get lit)
If you a freak, do your shit, don't run (Don't do no runnin', T-Raww, let's go)

[Verse 3: Tyga]
Uh, hurricane, it's soakin'
Yeah, that pussy like an ocean
Shawty clap that ass in the water and it's floatin'
Can you do it slow motion?
Ayy, fuck it up
Head down, hands on your knees, yeah
Fashion Nova dress, she gon' buy one every week, yeah
Just touched down, got a baddie on defense
Keep it on the low, he don't know that you creepin'
Left, right, fuck it right
The pussy taste like Mike and Ikes (Sweet)
She said, "What's your type?" I ain't got no type
But you gotta be yay high to ride this ride

[Chorus: 310babii]
If you a bad bitch, fuck it up (Fuck it up)
Freak bitch, she touch her toes like what? (Like huh?)
She said it's summertime, she tryna have some fun (Get lit)
If you a freak, do your shit, don't run (Don't do no runnin', Jeeezy)

[Verse 4: Jeeezy]
I walk in the function, all the bitches goin' up (Goin' up)
Make 'em leave the building if they scared to fuck it up (Fuck it up)
She invited me to soak city, here I come (Here I come)
Bitch, I'm tryna fuck you, I don't ever bite my tongue (What he say?)
How it sound when we fuckin' (Ooh)
Told her fuck it up, turn around, got you cussin' (Got you cussin')
Better not be shy on this dick, move the covers (Move the covers)
Hate when niggas lie and say they hit, ain't do nothin' (DJ)

[Verse 5: BlueBucksClan DJ]
Hate when bitches lie, she ain't thick, I ain't touchin' (I ain't touchin')
Takin' niggas' hoes at my shows, feel like Usher (Feel like Usher)
Your nigga lame, ain't on nothin', he a buster (He a buster)
We at soak city, fuck it up, this shit jumpin' (Fuck it up)
Move your hand, why you runnin'? (Move your hand)
Room full of bad bitches gettin' punished (Gettin' punished)
Yeah, I'm flexin' in this bitch, I'm the strongest (I'm the strongest)
Bad bitches fuck it up, you get a bonus (Yeah)

[Chorus: 310babii]
If you a bad bitch, fuck it up (Fuck it up)
Freak bitch, she touch her toes like what? (Like huh?)
She said it's summertime, she tryna have some fun (Get lit)
If you a freak, do your shit, don't run (Don't do no runnin', OhGeesy)

[Verse 6: OhGeesy]
Left, right, up, down like a cheat code
Only fuck with freak hoes who drink Casamigos
Let me see you drive the boat, show me how you deepthroat
I spent a check on that pussy 'cause you ain't a cheap ho
Breaking down walls like I work at Home Depot
Let me see you fuck it up to the beat, ho
Let me see you fuck it up, show ass and titties
Hit an opp block, turn that bitch to soak city
Hit an opp thot 'cause she wanna roll with me
Got the bitch contact saved under "Soak City"
Every time a nigga bust, she be screamin', "Leave it in me"
We stopped totin' thirties, only totin' fifties
Don't stop at the stop sign, shit get tricky
Told my nigga hold the strap, I'm 'bout to get jiggy
Yeah, I kill it from the back, somebody yell (Ricky)

[Outro: 310babii]
Alright, let me hear it all the way through

songs.rewrittenPrompt: An illustration in a vintage postcard style capturing the essence of a song. Depict a scene of a young person preparing to leave their small hometown, carrying heartfelt hopes and dreams. Their packed car is ready for a long journey ahead, hinting at future adventures. The town itself appears to be stuck in its past with nostalgic touches, old buildings creaking, and individuals in the midst of mundane tasks. The atmosphere is bittersweet, with residents, not depicted as angry, but rather waiting and hopeful for the traveler's return. Finally, convey a sense of optimism and determination, as if they are destined to go far.

songs.rewrittenPrompt: Create a double exposure image inspired by a typical night out with a high-energy, Latin-influenced rhythm. The image should depict a young woman leaving her house, her mood ignited and determined after a disagreement. She's heading to the club, where she intends to dance all night, lost in the music, portrayed by the silhouette of a DJ spinning records. The image should portray a lively club environment, including dance floor, pulsating lights, and people enjoying themselves. There is a mysterious allure in the air, amplified by shots of blue-hued drinks, symbolizing escapism and the freedom night-time adventures bring.

songs.rewrittenPrompt: Kinetic photograph interpretation of a song. The image captures the emotional intensity and the overall messaging highlighted in the lyrics. It depicts a symbolic journey in the darkness of night, with persistent thoughts that linger causing restlessness. This journey is fueled by an icy, fragile heart that whispers repeatedly, 'Don't die'. It also shows an individual sojourning a thousand miles through this gloom to reach a ray of hope - a comforting smile. The goal is to see this encouraging smile, a beacon of positivity amidst the hopelessness and to feel alive. Repeat elements of this journey to reflect recurring verses in the song.

songs.rewrittenPrompt: Depict a somber outdoor scene of a South Asian man reflecting on his life amid the majestic trees, which echo his past memories. In the background, a meandering creek is present, symbolizing the spiritual guidance he yearns for. His worn-out boots, ridden with holes and tar stains, are indicative of his trying life experiences and struggles. A deck of cards is next to him, with a display of unlucky sevens, representing his futile hopes. He holds a piece of coal, symbolizing the burdens he carries, while a diamond sits out of reach, a powerful visual metaphor of the pressure he feels and the transformation he yearns for. A nearby calendar marks ‘October’ - a turning point in his life.

Show symbolic elements such as an oversized gold watch studded with diamonds, depicting the achievement of wealth and success. Incorporate a scene of a trip to California with imagery of palm trees. Capture the sense of infinitely expanding possibilities, the separation of mind and body due to overthinking, and the yearning to seize the moment. Include the motif of a spiral as a symbol of divinity and human ambition intertwined, drawing upon emblems of rhythm, connection, inspiration, and awe at the beauty and power in the world. Convey these elements in a way that resonates with the song's emotional significance and its challenge to perceive and embrace the unknown.

songs.title: Reflection
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I have come curiously close to the end, though
Beneath my self-indulgent pitiful hole
Defeated
I concede and move closer
I may find comfort here
I may find peace within the emptiness
How pitiful
It's calling me (Calling me)
It's calling me (Calling me)
It's calling me (Calling me)
It's calling me

[Verse 2]
And in my darkest moment, fetal and weeping
The moon tells me a secret, a confidant
As full and bright as I am
This light is not my own and
A million light reflections pass over me
The source is bright and endless
She resuscitates the hopeless
Without her, we are lifeless satellites drifting
And as I pull my head out, I am without one doubt
Don't want to be down here soothing my narcissism, I
Must crucify the ego before it's far too late
I pray the light lifts me out

[Refrain]
Before I pine away (Pine away)
Before I pine away (Pine away)
Before I pine away (Pine away)
Before I pine away

[Verse 3]
So crucify the ego, before it's far too late
And leave behind this place so negative and blind and cynical
And you will come to find that we are all one mind
Capable of all that's imagined and all conceivable
So let the light touch you so that the words spill through
And let the past break through, bringing out our hope and reason

[Refrain]
Before we pine away (Pine away)
Before we pine away (Pine away)
Before we pine away (Pine away)
Before we pine away
songs.rewrittenPrompt: Imagine an expression of pinhole photography, utilizing the ancient technique of a camera obscura. In this scene, a solitary individual is on the edge of a vast, empty expanse, possibly signifying a metaphorical pit of despair. Above, the sky fills with a full, radiant moon, a million little fragments of light cascading onto the individual below, reflecting off their form. This strange light can be seen as a symbol of hope and potential, breathing life into deserted spaces. The person begins to rise, there is a sense of crucifying the ego, leaving behind the negativity. The overall image should convey a journey from self-pity to self enlightenment and unity, embodying the key themes present in the lyrical content.

songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I, I don't have a whole lot of time
Um, okay, I'm a former employee of Area 51
I, I was let go on a medical discharge about a week ago and, and...
I've kind of been running across the country
Damn, I don't know where to start, they are
They are gonna, um, they'll triangulate on this position really really soon
Okay, um, um, okay
What we're thinking of as, as aliens
They are extra-dimensional beings
That, an earlier precursor of the, um, space program they made contact with
They, they are not what they claim to be
Uh, they've infiltrated a, a lot of aspects of, of, of the military establishment
Particularly the Area 51
Uh, the disasters that are coming, they, the military
I'm sorry, the government knows about them
And there's a lot of safe areas in this world that they could begin moving the population to now
They are not, they want those major population centers wiped out
So that the few that are left will be more easily controllable
songs.rewrittenPrompt: Paint an image of a large mural on a brick building's facade. The mural captures a sense of urgency, mystery, and conspiracy. It illustrates the scene of a lone, anxious figure, wearing a uniform suggesting he's been a former worker in a secretive governmental facility. The figure is on a desperate journey across a broad, windswept American landscape. Meanwhile, shadowy forms loom in the background: abstract figures which represent extra-dimensional beings. The painting employs a colour palette that builds a foreboding atmosphere.

songs.title: Terrible Lie (Album Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
(Hey God!)
Why are you doing this to me?
Am I not living up to what I'm supposed to be?
Why am I seething with this animosity?
(Hey God!)
I think you owe me a great big apology

[Chorus]
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!

[Verse 2]
(Hey God!)
I really don't know what you mean (don't know what you mean)
Seems like salvation comes only in our dreams
I feel my hatred grow all the more extreme (hatred grow all the more extreme)
(Hey God!)
Can this world really be as sad as it seems?

[Chorus]
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!

Don't take it away from me, I need you to hold on to

Don't tear it away from me, I need you to hold on to
Don't tear it, don't tear it, don't take it, don't take it, don't

[Verse 3]
(Hey God!)
There's nothing left for me to hide (left for me to hide)
I lost my ignorance, security, and pride
I'm all alone in a world you must despise
(Hey God!)
I believed your promises, your promises and lies

[Chorus]
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!
Terrible lie!

(Terrible lie!) I'm on my hands and knees, I want so much to believe

songs.rewrittenPrompt: Create an image using the claymation technique that allegorically represents the meaning and emotions elicited by Nine Inch Nails' song 'Terrible Lie'. The image should feature a desolate character grappling with disillusionment and a sense of betrayal. Their environment reflects the oppressive tone of the song - stark, cold, and desolate. Make sure to embody the frustration, the yearning for truth and the dissatisfaction towards perceived false promises. However, instead of depicting a divine entity, represent this through an abstract omnipresent pressure. Lastly, incorporate the theme of seeking solace and connection, which can be symbolized by the character reaching out into the void. No typographical elements should be used.

songs.title: Down In It (Album Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Now I'm down in it)
(Now I'm down in it)

[Verse 1]
Kinda like a cloud, I was up, way up in the sky
And I was feeling some feelings you wouldn't believe
Sometimes I don't believe them myself
And I decided I was never coming down
Just then, a tiny little dot
Caught my eye, it was just about too small to see
But I watched it way too long
It was pulling me down

[Chorus]
I was up above it (Oh! O-o)
I was up above it (Oh! O-o) Now I'm down in it
I was up above it (Oh! O-o)
I was up above it (Oh! O-o)
Now I'm down in it

[Verse 2]
Shut up! So what? What does it matter now?
I was swimmin' in the haze, now I crawl on the ground
And everything I never liked about you
Is kind of seeping into me
Try to laugh about it now
But isn't it funny how everything works out?
"I guess the joke's on me," she said

[Chorus]
I was up above it (Oh! O-o)
I was up above it (Oh! O-o) Now I'm down in it
I was up above it (Oh! O-o)
I was up above it (Oh! O-o) (Now I'm down in it)

[Bridge]
I used to be so big and strong
I used to know my right from wrong
I used to never be afraid
I used to be somebody!
I used to have something inside
Now just this hole that's open wide
I used to want it all
I used to be somebody

[Verse 3]
I'll cross my heart, I'll hope to die
But the needle's already in my eye
And all the world's weight is on my back
And I don't even know why
And what I used to think was me
Is just a fading memory
I looked him right in the eye

songs.rewrittenPrompt: Generate an impressionist-style painting depicting a poignant scene of unrequited love, inspired by lyrics from a popular song. In the center, show a man of Black descent with a melancholic expression, contemplating his feelings for a woman. songs.title: Hollywood's Bleeding
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh

[Verse 1]
Hollywood's bleeding, vampires feedin'
Darkness turns to dust
Everyone's gone, but no one's leavin'
Nobody left but us
Tryna chase a feelin', but we'll never feel it

Yeah, Hollywood is bleedin', but we call it home

[Verse 2]
Outside, the winter sky turnin' grey
City up in smoke, it's only ash when it rains
Howl at the moon and go to sleep in the day
Love for everybody 'til the drugs fade away
In the mornin', blocking out the sun with the shades
She gotta check her pulse to tell herself that she okay
It seem like dyin' young is an honor
But who'd be at my funeral? I wonder
I go out and all they eyes on me
I show out, do you like what you see?
And now they closin' in on me
Let 'em sharpen all they teeth
This is more than I can handle, blood in my Lambo'
Wish I could go, oh, I'm losin' ho-ope
I light a candle, some Palo Santo
For all these demons, wish I could just go home

[Chorus]
I just keep on hopin' that you call me
You say you wanna see me, but you can't right now
You never took the time to get to know me
We're scared of losin' somethin' that we never found
We're runnin' out of reasons, but we can't let go
Yeah, Hollywood is bleedin', but we call it home

songs.rewrittenPrompt: An abstract surrealist painting which visualizes the sentiment and essential message behind a melancholic song with themes of deception, unreciprocated love, and resilience. In the composition, imagine two figures separated by a winding river of blood symbolizing a broken bond. One figure is shrouded in shadows, depicting deception and betrayal. The other is standing strong, yet distanced, symbolizing resilience and the unwillingness to shed tears. The environment around them is eerie and twisted, with ghostly visages from the past emerging from the terrain, conveying the concept of past mistakes and lessons learned. There's an element of dichotomy represented as a potentially serene paradise and a daunting representation of death.
